text: Eteke te'om nija sahodara bhayekara topola coraara agate sihamtara topolata bicaraibalai dharaile, pichata te'omra sahodara bhayekara topolara paraa patrato uliya'i anile. Enekai ami i'uchuphara babe kausala karaichilo. Allahe iccha nakaraile rajara a'inata te'omra bhatrka ataka karaa sangata nachila. Ami yaka iccha maryadata ucca karai di'om. Karana pratyeka jnanabana byaktira oparata ache sarbajnani
